author: Lisa Xing
title: 'I was really shocked': This woman was told she'd have to wait more than 4 days to hear from Telehealth
description: Telehealth Ontario wait times have now increased with some people waiting up to four days for a call from a health-care professional. Now, the health minister says people should call their family doctors for appointments first.
content:
The Ontario government is instructing people to call their primary-care physician, if they have one, instead of its Telehealth system after widespread complaints that the wait time to speak to a nurse is several days.
"For people to call their own family doc… [+3138 chars]
